trait.name: Dive Attack
entries: If the aarakocra is flying and dives at least 30 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a atac armat melé, the attack deals an extra 3 ({@dice 1d6}) damage to the target.

trait.name: Simulacra
entries: When a simulacrum es queda a 0 punts de cop or is subjected to a successful {@spell dissipar màgia} spell ({@dc 17}), it reverts to ice and snow and is destroyed.

action.name: Talon
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Summon Air Elemental
entries: Five aarakocra within 30 feet of each other can magically summon an air elemental. Each of the five must use its action and movement on three consecutive turns to perform an aerial dance and must maintain concentration while doing so (as if concentrating on a spell). When all five have finished their third turn of the dance, the elemental apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of them. It is friendly toward them and obeys their spoken commands. It remains for 1 hour, until it or all its summoners die, or until any of its summoners dismisses it as a bonus action. A summoner can't perform the dance again until it finishes a short rest. When the elemental returns to the Elemental Plane of Air, any aarakocra within 5 feet of it can return with it.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Augrek has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Sheriff's deputy Augrek guards the southwest gate of Bryn Shander and welcomes visitors to town. She has a good heart.
Ideal: "You'll get farther in life with a kind word than an axe."
Bond: "Bryn Shander is my home. It's my job to protect her."
Flaw: "I'm head over heels in love with Sheriff Southwell. One day I hope to marry him."

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany contundent, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant. Augrek carries ten crossbow bolts.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The soldier makes two battleaxe attacks. If it has a handaxe drawn, it can also make a handaxe attack.

items.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

items.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Beldora is a member of the harpers who survives using her wits and wiles. She looks like a homeless waif, but she's a survivor who shies away from material wealth.
Ideal: "We should all strive to help one another"
Bond: "I'll risk my life to protect the powerless."
Flaw: "I like lying to people. Makes life more interesting, no?"

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant. Beldora carries ten crossbow bolts.

reaction.name: Duck and Cover
entries: Beldora adds 2 to her AC against one ranged attack that would hit her. To do so, Beldora must see the attacker and can't be {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greatclub attacks or two unarmed attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Unarmed Attack
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 3d4 + 5}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) de dany contundent.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: Chief Kartha fa dos atacs, either with his flame tongue greatsword or his longbow.

items.name: Flame Tongue Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany tallant mes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Golden Pin
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de Claugiyliamatar's és Saviesa ({@dc 19} per salvar conjur). Claugiyliamatar pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Claugiyliamatar is an 8th-level spellcaster. Her habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa ({@dc 18} salvada de conjur, {@hit 10} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

items.name: Maintainable
entries: Repairing 1 hit point of damage to the clockwork mule takes 1 hour and requires replacement parts, which can be bought in a large city for 20 gp. If the mule es queda a 0 punts de cop, it is destroyed and unrepairable.

items.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Thullen és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Sansuri és Carisma. Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Sansuri és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 13. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 15}; {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: Sansuri has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Estimbar
entries: Sansuri tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of her. The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20} or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of Sansuri's choice and land {@condition prone}, taking {@dice 1d8} de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown.

action.name: Wind Aura
entries: A magical aura of wind surrounds Sansuri. The aura is a 10-foot-radius sphere that lasts as long as Sansuri maintains concentration on it (as if concentrating on a spell). While the aura is in effect, Sansuri gains a +2 bonus to its AC against atacs armats a distància, and all open flames within the aura are extinguished unless they are magical.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Sansuri makes two spear attacks.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Indetectable
entries: The cat cannot be targeted or detected by any divination magic or perceived through magical scrying sensors.

trait.name: Abraonar
entries: If the cat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC13 Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the cat can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Spell Turning
entries: The cat has advantage on saving throws against any spell that targets only the cat (not an area). If the cat's saving throw succeeds and the spell is of 7th level or lower, the spell has no effect on the cat and instead targets the caster.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Coratge
entries: Darathra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: As the Lord Protector of Triboar and a secret agent of the Harpers, Darathra has sworn an oath to defend the town. She takes her duty very seriously. In addition to her gear, Darathra has an unarmored warhorse named Buster.
Ideal: "Good people should be given every chance to prosper, free of tyranny."
Bond: "I'll lay down my life to protect Triboar and its citizens."
Flaw: "I refuse to back down. Push me, and I'll push back."

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Darthra fa dos atacs armats melé.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany tallant

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant. Darathra carries twenty crossbow bolts.

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: En Darz fa 7 ({@dice 2d6}) extra de dany quan impacta amb un atac armat i: o bé té avantatge a impactar, o bé l'objectiu té un aliat d'en Darz a 5 peus que no està {@condition incapacitated} i l'atacant no té desavantatge a impactar.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: In his youth, Darz was a member of the Xanathar Thieves' Guild in Waterdeep. After serving ten years in prison for his crimes, he cut all ties to the city and moved north to be a campground caretaker.
Ideal: "You can run from your past, but you can't hide from it."
Bond: "I've made a new life in Triboar. I'm not gonna run away this time. "
Flaw: "I have no regrets. I do whatever it takes to survive."

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Fona
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany perforant. Darz carries twenty sling stones.

items.name: Olach Morrah
entries: The giant meditates for 1 hour, during which time it can do nothing else. At the end of the hour, provided the giant's meditation has been uninterrupted, it becomes {@condition petrified} for 8 hours. At the end of this time, the giant is no longer petrified and gains tremorsense out to a range of 30 feet, as well as a measure of habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata for the next 24 hours.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The giant és Saviesa. Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Brimskarda carries a {@item potion of invisibility}, which she quaffs on her first turn in combat.

items.name: Iron Cauldron
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: Zalto fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Zalto wears a {@item ring of lightning resistència}.

trait.name: Tackle
entries: When Zalto enters any enemy's space for the first time on a turn, the enemy ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 19} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Zalto makes two maul attacks.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 6d6 + 7}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: The daughter of a Waterdhavian trader and a tavern server, Duvessa has her mother's talent for negotiation and her father's charm. As the first woman to serve as Town Speaker of Bryn Shander, and a young one at that, she has much to prove.
Ideal: "The people of Icewind Dale are survivors. They can weather any storm."
Bond: "My mother taught me what it means to be a good leader. I won't disappoint her."
Flaw: "I don't give an inch in any argument of conflict."

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant. Duvessa carries only one dagger.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Duvessa adds 2 to her AC against one melee attack that would hit her. To do so, Duvessa must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

items.name: Rejovenir
entries: If it is destroyed, the ghost re-forms after 24 hours. To truly destroy the ghost, characters must lay Eigeron's spirit to rest by killing Blagothkus.

items.name: Posseïr {@recharge}
entries: One humanoid or giant that the ghost can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Carisma saving throw or be possessed by the ghost; the ghost then disappears, and the target is {@condition incapacitated} and loses control of its body. The ghost now controls the body but doesn't deprive the target of awareness. The ghost no pot ser objectiu de cap atac, conjur, o efecte excepte els que expulsen no-morts, and retè l'alineament, la Intel·ligència, la Saviesa, el Carisma, i la immunitat a ésser {@condition charmed} o {@condition frightened}. La resta d'estadístiques són les de l'objectiu, però no en guanya els coneixements, trets de classes, o competències.

La possessió dura fins que el cos es quedi a 0 punts de toc, the ghost la cancel·li com a acció bonus, o the ghost sigui expulsat per un efecte com el de dissipar el bé i el mal spell. Quan la possessió acaba the ghost reapareix en un espai lliure a 5 peus del cos. L'objectiu és immune a possessions d'aquest this ghost's durant 24 hores des que supera la salvada o la possessió acaba. If a creature possessed by the ghost is forcibly removed from the Eye of Annam, the ghost is expelled from its host and re-forms in the middle of this room.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Elister és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 5. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de clergue preparats:

trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Ghelryn has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Giant Slayer
entries: Any weapon attack that Ghelryn makes against a giant deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage on a hit.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: The blacksmith Ghelryn has a good heart, but he hates orcs and giants—hates them with a fiery passion. He considers it the solemn duty of all dwarves to cave in their skulls!
Ideal: "It is incumbent upon every dwarf to forge a legacy."
Bond: "I stand for Clan Foehammer and all dwarvenkind."
Flaw: "I never run from a fight, especially if it involves killing orcs or giants."

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Ghelryn makes two battleaxe attacks.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) de dany tallant, o 9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Greataxe +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (1/Dia)
entries: Si Harshnag falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Weighted Net
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, ranged 20/60 ft., one Small, Medium, or Large creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} until it escapes the net. Any creature can use its action to make a {@dc 17} Força check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two greataxe attacks.

action.name: Gurt's Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) de dany tallant, o 39 ({@damage 5d12 + 7}) de dany tallant if the target is human.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: The crab pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Shell Camouflage
entries: While the crab remains motionless with its eyestalks and pincers tucked close to its body, it resembles a natural formation or a pile of detritus. A creature within 30 feet of it can discern its true nature with a successful {@dc 15} Intel·ligència (Nature) check.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The crab fa dos atacs with its claws.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 15} per escapar). The crab té dos claws, i cadascun només pot apresar  un objectiu

items.name: Icy Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing, and takes 1 cold damage a l'inici de cada torn seu. Com a acció, the {@condition restrained} target can make a DC 12 Força check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to poison, and psychic damage).

items.name: Aura Freda
entries: Tota criatura que comenci el seu torn a 5 peus de the spider rep 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany de fred.

items.name: Icy Web {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 30/60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} by webbing, and takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany de fred a l'inici de cada torn seu. Com a acció, the {@condition restrained} target can make a DC 12 Força check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to poison, and psychic damage).

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: Uthor makes two trident attacks.

items.name: Trident of Fish Command
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) de dany perforant, or ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) de dany perforant si s'usa amb dues mans.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de Iymrith's és Saviesa ({@dc 20} per salvar conjur). Iymrith's moldejar la pedra can create a living gargoyle instead of altering the stone as described in the spell description. Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Iymrith falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Iymrith can use her Presència Aterradora. She then fa tres atacs: one with her bite and two with her claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) de dany perforant mes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d8 + 9}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Each creature of Iymrith's choice that is within 120 feet of Iymrith and aware of ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 20} o estar {@condition frightened} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si una criatura supera la salvada o aquest efecte se li cancel·la, the creature is immune to Iymrith's Presència Aterradora for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Alè de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: Iymrith exhala lamps en una línia de 120 peus de llarg i 10 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 23}. Qui falli rep 88 ({@damage 16d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Canviar de Forma
entries: Iymrith magically polymorphs into a female {@creature storm giant} or back into her true form. She reverts to her true form if she dies. Any equipment she is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (Iymrith's choice).

In storm giant form, Iymrith retains her alignment, hit points, Hit Dice, ability to speak, proficiencies, Resistència Llegendària, lair actions, and Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores, as well as this action. Her statistics are otherwise replaced by those of the new form.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: Iymrith makes una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}).

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: Iymrith fa un atac Cua.

legendary.name: Atac Ala (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Iymrith bat les ales. Tota criatura a 15 peus seus ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 24} o rebre 16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) de dany contundent i esdevenir {@condition prone}. Llavors Iymrith pot volar fins la meitat de la seva velocitat de vol.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Jarl Storvald és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Coneix els encanteris d'explorador següents:

Any creature can use its action to make a {@dc 17} Força check to free itself or another creature in the net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 15 slashing damage to the net (AC 12) destroys the net and frees the target.

action.name: Greataxe

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent.

items.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

items.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innat de The giant's és Saviesa ({@dc 17} per salvar conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Hekaton pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Hekaton makes two broken chain attacks.

action.name: Broken Chain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Balista
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 120/480 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d10 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Llança de Llamp {@recharge 5}
entries: Hekaton hurls a magical lightning bolt at a point he can see within 500 feet of it. Each creature within 10 feet of that point ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17}. Qui falli rep 54 ({@damage 12d8}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

action.name: Thunderous Stomp {@recharge}
entries: Hekaton stomps the ground, triggering a thunderclap. All other creatures within 15 feet of him ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 17} or take 33 ({@damage 6d10}) de dany de tro and be {@condition deafened} until the start of Hekaton's next turn. Qui superi en rep la meitat i no està {@condition deafened}. The thunderclap can be heard out to a range of 1,200 feet.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Klauth's habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Carisma ({@dc 22} salvació de conjur). Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Klauth és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 14. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 20} {@hit 12} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Klauth falla una tirada de salvació pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Dual Wand Wielder
entries: If Klauth is carrying two wands, he can use an action to expend 1 charge from each wand, triggering the effects of both wands simultaneously.

trait.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Klauth carries a {@item wand of fireballs} and a {@item wand of lightning bolts}, and he wears a {@item ring of cold resistència}.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Klauth can use his Presència Aterradora. He then fa tres atacs: one with his bite and two with his claws.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) de dany perforant mes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) de dany de foc.

action.name: Urpa
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 20 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d8 + 10}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Presència Aterradora
entries: Tota criatura que Klauth's designi que hi estigui a 120 peus d'abast i en coneguin la presència ha de salvar per Saviesa amb {@dc 21} o estar {@condition frightened} durant 1 minut. Una criatura pot repetir la salvada al final de cada torn seu, acabant l'efecte prematurament si supera. Si una criatura supera la salvada o aquest efecte se li cancel·la, the creature is immune to Klauth's Presència Aterradora for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Alè de Fire {@recharge 5}
entries: Klauth exhales fire en un con de 90 peus. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 24}. Qui falli rep 91 ({@damage 26d6}) de dany de foc; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Detectar
entries: Klauth makes una tirada de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}).

legendary.name: Atac de Cua
entries: Klauth fa un atac Cua.

legendary.name: Atac Ala (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Klauth beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of Klauth ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 25} or take 17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) de dany contundent and be knocked {@condition prone}. Klauth can then fly up to half his flying speed.

items.name: Possessed
entries: While the knight is possessed by yakfolk, its alignment is lawful evil and it can speak Yikaria (the yakfolk tongue).

items.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany contundent, o 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

trait.name: Falsa Aparença
entries: While Lifferlas remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: A druid of the Emerald Enclave awakened the tree Lifferlas with a spell. Goldenfields is his home, its people his friends. Children like to carve their name and initials into his body and hang from his boughs, and he's happy with that.
Ideal: "I exist to protect the people and plants of Goldenfields."
Bond: "Children are wonderful. I would do anything to make them feel happy and safe."
Flaw: "I can't remember people's names and often get them mixed up."

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Lifferlas makes two slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: Maegera's spell casting ability is Carisma. Maegera's can innately cast the following spell ({@dc 19} salvació de conjur), requiring no material components:

trait.name: Empowered Attacks
entries: Maegera's slam attacks are treated as magical for the purpose of overcoming resistance and immunity to damage from nonmagical attacks.

trait.name: Fire Aura
entries: A l'inici de cada torn de Maegera, each creature within 30 feet of it takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany de foc, and flammable objects in the aura que ningú estigui portant o vestint ignite. A creature also takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany de foc from touching Maegera or from hitting it with a melee attack while within 10 feet of it, and a creature takes that damage the first time on a turn that Maegera moves into its space. Nonmagical weapons that hit Maegera are destroyed by fire immediately after dealing damage to it.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: Maegera can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It pot moure's a través d'un espai d'1 polzada quadrada sense problema if fire could pass through that space.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: Maegera sheds bright light in a 120-foot radius and dim light in an additional 120 ft.

trait.name: Resistència a la Màgia
entries: Maegera té avantatge a salvar contra conjurs i altres efectes màgics.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Maegera makes three slam attacks.

action.name: Colpeig
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) de dany contundent mes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) de dany de foc

legendary.name: Quench Magic
entries: Maegera targets one creature that it can see within 60 feet of it. Any resistance or immunity to fire damage that the target gains from a spell or magic item is suppressed. The effect lasts until the end of Maegera's next turn.

legendary.name: Smoke Cloud (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Maegera exhales a billowing cloud of hot smoke and embers that fills a 60 feet cube. Tota criatura dins de l'àrea takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) de dany de foc. The cloud lasts until the end of Maegera's next turn. Creatures completely in the cloud are {@condition blinded} and can't be seen.

legendary.name: Create Fire Elemental (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: Maegera's hit points are reduced by 50 as part of it separates and becomes a {@creature fire elemental} with 102 hit points. The fire element apareix en un espai desocupat within 15 feet of Maegera and acts on Maegera's initiative count. Maegera can't use this action if it has 50 hit points or fewer. The fire element obeys Maegera's commands and fights until destroyed.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Sheriff Markham of Bryn Shander is a brawny, likable man of few words. Nothing is more important to him than protecting Icewind Dale. He judges others by their actions, not their words.
Ideal: "All people deserve to be treated with dignity."
Bond: "Duvessa is a natural leader, but she needs help. That's my job."
Flaw: "I bury my emotions and have no interest in small talk."

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Markham fa dos atacs armats melé.

action.name: Espasa llarga
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, o 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany perforant. Markham carries twenty crossbow bolts.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Innkeeper Miros is a retired carnival attraction, dubbed "the Yeti" because of his barrel-shaped body and the thick, white hair covering his arms, chest, back, and head. When Goldenfields suffers, so does his business, so he takes strides to protect the compound.
Ideal: "As does the Emerald Enclave, I believe that civilization and the wilderness need to learn to coexist."
Bond: "Make fun of me all you like, but don't speak ill of my inn or my employees."
Flaw: "When something upsets me, I have a tendency to fly into a rage."

action.name: Bear Hug
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent, and the target {@condition grappled} ({@dc 13} per escapar) and takes 5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany contundent at the start of each of Miros's turns until the grapple ends. Miros cannot make attacks while grappling a creature.

action.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany contundent

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant. Miros carries ten crossbow bolts.

items.name: Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Acció Astuta
entries: A cada torn seu, Narth pot Córrer, Destravar-se o Amagar-se com a acció bonus.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Narth sells gear to adventurers, and he also has an adventurous spirit. The Lionshield Coster pays him well, but he longs to make a name for himself. At the same time, he runs a business with his partner Alaestra and knows she wouldn't forgive him if he ran off and never returned.
Ideal: "The bigger the risk, the greater the reward."
Bond: "I adore my colleague Alestra, and I'd like to do something to impress her."
Flaw: "I'll risk life and limb to become a legend.-"

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant. Narth carries twenty crossbow bolts.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Naxene is a 6th level spellcaster. Her habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 13}; {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Goldenfields' crops are vital Waterdeep's survival, which is why the Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors sent Naxene to make sure the temple-farm is adequately defended. At first she regarded the task as a punishment, but now she appreciates the peace and quiet.
Ideal: "There's no problem that can't be solved with magic."
Bond: "I have great respect for Lady Laeral Silverhand of Waterdeep. She and the Lords' Alliance are going to bring some much-needed order to this lawless land."
Flaw: "I'm too smart to be wrong about anything."

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 1} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1}) de dany contundent, o 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

items.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Nimir is an insightful, even-keeled storm giant who believes that a lasting alliance between giants and small folk can make the world a safer, more enlightened place. He believes King Hekaton was wise to choose Princess Serissa as his heir apparent, and it would never occur to him to question their orders.
Ideal: "It's the duty of the big to protect the small."
Bond: "I'd give my life to defend my king and his royal line."
Flaw: "I never question orders."

items.name: Goblin Projectile
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast (can't hit targets within 30 feet of the hucker), un objectiu. Hit: 5 ({@damage 2d4}) de dany contundent, o 10 ({@damage 4d4}) de dany perforant if the projectile is wearing a spiked helmet. {@i Hit or Miss:} The goblin projectile takes {@damage 1d6} de dany contundent per 10 feet it travels through the air (maximum {@damage 20d6}).

trait.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: Oren can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than his.

trait.name: Lucky
entries: When Oren rolls a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, he can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

trait.name: Stout Resilience
entries: Oren has advantage on saving throws against poison

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Oren came to Nurthfurrow's End looking for easy work and found it. He sings for his supper, drinks like a fish, and wanders the fields at night dreaming up new lyrics to entertain the inn's other guests. Oren likes to stir up trouble from time to time, but he doesn't have a mean bone in his body.
Ideal: "Music is food for the soul."
Bond: "You had me at "Can I buy you a drink."
Flaw: "I have a knack for putting myself in harm's way. Good thing I'm lucky!"

action.name: Daga
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany perforant. Duvessa carries only one dagger.

items.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Orlekto is in love with Princess Mirran and wants to see her become Queen of the Wyrmskull Throne. (If Mirran is dead, Orlekto aims to avenge her.) If the opportunity to eliminate Hekaton or Serissa presents itself, Orlekto seizes it. Until then, he conceals his treacherous nature.
Ideal: "Storm giants should rule the world. Weak leaders have let dragons and others steal what the gods gave to us!"
Bond: "I serve Princess Mirran and her alone."
Flaw: "For Mirran's love or my revenge, I'd betray my king and my honor."

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Othovir és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 2. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Carisma (spell save {@dc 13}; {@hit 5} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de fetiller preparats:

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Othovir is a gifted harness-maker who doesn't talk about his family or where he came from. He cares about his business, his clients, and his good name.
Ideal: "Find what you do well, and do it to the best of your ability."
Bond: "I won't allow my name to be tarnished."
Flaw: "I get angry when others pry into my private life."

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany perforant.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Othovir adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Othovir must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

items.name: Equipament Especial
entries: Pow carries a {@item bag of holding} and wears a {@item robe of serpents|skt} with six snakes.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Pow és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Intel·ligència ({@dc 14} salvada de conjur, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The wormling fa dos atacs: one with its bite and one with its stinger.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Small or smaller creature, ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 13} or be swallowed by the worm. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the wormling, and it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany d'àcid at the start of each of the wormling's turns.

Si the wormling rep 10 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 21} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition prone} a 10 peus d'abast de the wormling. If the wormling dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant, i l'objectiu ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 13}. Qui falli rep 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

items.name: Ascendència Faèrica
entries: The sea elf has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and the sea elf no pot ésser adormit màgicament.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: Serissa makes two maul attacks.

items.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 6d6 + 9}) de dany contundent.

items.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: A skilled rider of rocs and whales, Shaldoor believes that Annam the All-Father shattered the ordning to push giants into war against the dragons. She is thrilled to be on the front lines in this great conflict!
Ideal: "Giants are made for war—storm giants most of all!"
Bond: "Ostoria is gone, yet I long for the return of a mighty giant empire."
Flaw: "I like to rain destruction down upon my enemies, and I never show them mercy."

trait.name: Atac Furtiu (1/Torn)
entries: En Shalvus fa 7 ({@dice 2d6}) extra de dany quan impacta amb un atac armat i: o bé té avantatge a impactar, o bé l'objectiu té un aliat d'en Shalvus a 5 peus que no està {@condition incapacitated} i l'atacant no té desavantatge a impactar.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Nalaskur Thaelond of Bargewright Inn has entrusted the shepherd Shalvus with an important assignment: to figure out the best way by which Goldenfields can be brought under the Black Network's control. Shalvus believes that success will ensure his swift rise through the Zhentarim ranks.
Ideal: "I'll do what it takes to prove myself to the Zhentarim."
Bond: "I love animals, and I'm very protective of them."
Flaw: "I can't resist taking risks to feed my ambitions."

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent, o 4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany contundent if used with both hands.

action.name: Hand Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant. Shalvus carries ten crossbow bolts.

items.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Warhammer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany contundent, o 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany contundent, o 6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

trait.name: Coratge
entries: Baric has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: As a knight of the Order of the Gauntlet, Sir Baric has sworn oaths to catch evildoers and bring them to justice. His current quarry is a dwarf brigand, Worvil "the Weevil" Forkbeard, who is rumored to be hiding in Icewind Dale. In addition to his gear, Sir Baric has an unarmored warhorse, Henry.
Ideal: "Evil must not be allowed to thrive in this world."
Bond: "Tyr is my lord; the order, my family. Through my actions, I shall honor both."
Flaw: "I'm not afraid to die. When Tyr finally calls me, I'll go to him happily."

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Ballesta Pesada
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 100/400 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) de dany perforant. Baric carries twenty crossbow bolts.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: An acolyte of Torm, Sirac grew up on the streets of Suzail, the capital of Cormyr. He came to Icewind Dale to become a knucklehead trout fisher but instead found religion. The misbegotten son of Artus Cimber, a renowned human adventurer, Sirac hasn't seen his father since he was a baby.
Ideal: "Without duty or loyalty, a man is nothing."
Bond: "Icewind Dale is where i belong for the rest of my life."
Flaw: "I am honest to a fault."

action.name: Espasa curta
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Dard
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany perforant. Sirac carries six darts.

reaction.name: Parada
entries: Sirac adds 2 to his AC against on melee attack that would hit him. To do so, Sirac must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

monster.name: Slarkrethel
languages: and Primordial però no pot parlar

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Slarkrethel és un/a llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 20. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència ({@dc 22} salvada de conjur, {@hit 14} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Resistència Llegendària (3/Dia)
entries: Si Slarkrethel falla una salvació, pot escollir superar-la.

trait.name: Amfibi
entries: Slarkrethel pot respirar aire i a l'aigua

trait.name: Llibertat de Moviments
entries: Slarkrethel ignores difficult terrain, and magical effects can't reduce its speed or cause it to be {@condition restrained}. It can spend 5 feet of movement to escape from nonmagical restraints or being {@condition grappled}.

trait.name: Monstre de Setge
entries: Slarkrethel fa el doble de dany a objectes i a estructures.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Slarkrethel makes three tentacle attacks, each of which it can replace with one use of Fling.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) de dany perforant. If the target is a Large or smaller creature {@condition grappled} by Slarkrethel, that creature is swallowed, and the grapple ends. Una criatura empassada està {@condition blinded} i {@condition restrained}, té cobertura total contra atacs fora de Slarkrethel, i rep 42 ({@damage 12d6}) de dany d'àcid a l'inici de cada torn de Slarkrethel's. Si Slarkrethel rep 50 o més de dany en un sol torn d'una criatura a dins seu, ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 25} al final del torn. Si falla, regurgita tota criatura empassada, que queden {@condition prone} a 10 peus d'abast de Slarkrethel. If Slarkrethel dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} a impactar, 30 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) de dany contundent, i l'objectiu està {@condition grappled} ({@dc 18} per escapar). Fins que s'acabi aquesta presa, l'objectiu està {@condition restrained}. Slarkrethel té deu tentacles, i cadascun pot apresar un objectiu.

action.name: Estimbar
entries: One Large or smaller object held or creature {@condition grappled} by Slarkrethel is thrown up to 60 feet in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes a solid surface, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 18} or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lightning Storm
entries: Slarkrethel magically creates three bolts of lightning, each of which can strike a target Slarkrethel can see within 120 feet of it. A target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 23}. Qui falli rep 22 ({@damage 4d10}) de dany elèctric; qui superi, en rep la meitat.

legendary.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling
entries: Slarkrethel makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.

legendary.name: Lightning Storm (Costa 2 Accions)
entries: Slarkrethel uses Lightning Storm.

legendary.name: Núvol de tinta (Costa 3 Accions)
entries: While underwater, Slarkrethel expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud s'extén per les cantonades, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than Slarkrethel. Each creature other than Slarkrethel that ends its turn there ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 23}. Qui falli rep 16 ({@damage 3d10}) de dany de verí; qui superi, en rep la meitat. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of Slarkrethel's next turn.

items.name: Garrot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The giant has advantage on Destresa (Sigil) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Olach Morrah
entries: The giant meditates for 1 hour, during which time it can do nothing else. At the end of the hour, provided the giant's meditation has been uninterrupted, it becomes {@condition petrified} for 8 hours. At the end of this time, the giant is no longer {@condition petrified} and gains tremorsense out to a range of 30 feet, as well as a measure of habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata based on Saviesa. For the next 24 hours, pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):
3/day: fondre's dins la pedra, moldejar la pedra
1/day: pell de pedra, deturar el temps

action.name: Estimbar
entries: The giant tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17} or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of the giant's choice. and land {@condition prone}, taking {@dice 1d6} de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown.

action.name: Rolling Rock
entries: The giant sends a rock tumbling along the ground en una línia de 30 peus de llarg i 5 d'ample. Tota criatura dins de la línia ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 17}, taking 22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) de dany contundent and falling {@condition prone} on a failed save

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The giant makes two adamantine greatclub attacks.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 15 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) de dany contundent.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) de dany contundent. If the target is a creature, ha de salvar per Força amb {@dc 17} or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Rock Catching
entries: If a rock or similar object is hurled at the giant, the giant can, with a successful {@dc 10} Destresa saving throw, catch the missile and take no dany contundent from it.

items.name: Multi-atac
entries: The Weevil makes three melee attacks with his handaxes. Or the Weevil makes two ranged attacks with his handaxes.

items.name: Handaxe +1
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Mossegada
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Cua
entries: {@hit 7} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany contundent. Succeed on a DC14 Força saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Tressym
languages: understands Common però no pot parlar

trait.name: Detect Invisibility
entries: Within 60 feet of the tressym, magical invisibility fails to conceal anything from the tressym's sight.

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The tressym has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

trait.name: Poison Sense
entries: The tressym can detect whether a substance is poisonous by taste, touch, or smell.

trait.name: Familiar
entries: With the DM's permission, a person who casts the trobar familiar spell can choose to conjure a tressym in stead of a normal cat.

action.name: Urpes
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 0} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}1 de dany tallant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Turlang és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 9. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de druida preparats:

trait.name: Giant Slayer
entries: Any weapon attack that Urgala makes against a giant deals an extra 7 ({@dice 2d6}) damage on a hit.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: A retired adventurer, Urgala owns a respectable inn, the North shield House, and she doesn't want to see it or her neighbors' homes destroyed. She has no tolerance for monsters or bullies.
Ideal: "We live in a violent world, and sometimes violence is necessary for survival."
Bond: "My home is my life. Threaten it, and I'll hurt you."
Flaw: "I know how treacherous and greedy adventurers can be. I don't trust them—any of them."

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Urgala fa dos atacs with her morningstar or her shortbow.

action.name: Morningstar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant. Urgala carries a quiver of twenty arrows.

items.name: Oathbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) de dany perforant, mes an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) de dany perforant against a sworn enemy See the {@item oathbow} entry for the other properties.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The shaman can innately cast the following spells. Its habilitat de llançament de conjurs is Saviesa ({@dc 12} salvada de conjur, {@hit 4} a impactar amb atacs màgics).

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 20/60 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) de dany perforant, o 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany perforant if wielded with two hands.

action.name: Arc curt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 80/320 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany perforant.

items.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Vaasha is a skilled hunter and tracker who doesn't charge into danger without first assessing the risks. She's not afraid to speak her mind, even to her king. To her, a worthy leader values the truth, no matter how painful it is.
Ideal: "I want this conflict over with so that I can return to the quiet stillness of the ocean depths."
Bond: "I'll protect this beautiful world from the ravages of evil with my dying breath."
Flaw: "I don't care if my words hurt others' feelings."

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: The yakfolk és llançador/a de conjurs de nivell 7. La seva habilitat de llançament de conjurs és Saviesa (CD per salvar conjur {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} a impactar amb atacs màgics). The priest has the following cleric spells prepared:

trait.name: Posseïr (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The yakfolk attempts to magically possess a humanoid or giant. The yakfolk must touch the target throughout a short rest, or the attempt fails. At the end of the rest, the target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be possessed by the yakfolk, which disappears with everything it is carrying and wearing. Until the possession ends, the target is {@condition incapacitated}, loses control of its body, and is unaware of its surroundings. The yakfolk now controls the body and can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment; its Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores; and its proficiencies. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, except the target's knowledge, class features, feats, and proficiencies.

The possession lasts until either the body es queda a 0 punts de cop, the yakfolk ends the possession com a acció, or the yakfolk is forced out of the body by an effect such as the {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal} spell. When the possession ends, the yakfolk reapareix en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of the body i està {@condition stunned} fins el final del seu proper torn. If the host body dies while it is possessed by the yakfolk, the yakfolk dies as well, and its body doesn't reappear.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The yakfolk fa dos atacs melé.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany contundent, o 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Summon Earth Elemental (1/Dia)
entries: The yakfolk summons an {@creature earth elemental}. The elemental apareix en un espai desocupat within 60 feet of its summoner and acts as an ally of the summoner. It remains for 10 minutes, until it dies, or until its summoner dismisses it as an action.

trait.name: Posseïr (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: The yakfolk attempts to magically possess a humanoid or giant. The yakfolk must touch the target throughout a short rest, or the attempt fails. At the end of the rest, the target ha de salvar per Constitució amb {@dc 12} or be possessed by the yakfolk, which disappears with everything it is carrying and wearing. Until the possession ends, the target is {@condition incapacitated}, loses control of its body, and is unaware of its surroundings. The yakfolk now controls the body and can't be targeted by any attack, spell, or other effect, and it retains its alignment; its Intel·ligència, Saviesa, and Carisma scores; and its proficiencies. It otherwise uses the target's statistics, except the target's knowledge, class features, feats, and proficiencies.

The possession lasts until either the body es queda a 0 punts de cop, the yakfolk ends the possession com a acció, or the yakfolk is forced out of the body by an effect such as the {@spell dissipar el bé i el mal} spell. When the possession ends, the yakfolk reapareix en un espai desocupat within 5 feet of the body i està {@condition stunned} fins el final del seu proper torn. If the host body dies while it is possessed by the yakfolk, the yakfolk dies as well, and its body doesn't reappear.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: The yakfolk fa dos atacs, either with its greatsword or its longbow.

action.name: Espasa Gran
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Arc llarg
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, 150/600 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de The giant és Carisma. Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: The giant has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Destral de guerra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) de dany tallant, o 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) de dany tallant si s'usa amb dues mans.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast o 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) de dany perforant.

spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: L'habilitat de llançament de conjurs innata de Zephyros és Carisma. Pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

spellcasting.name: Llançament de Conjurs
headerEntries: Zephyros és un llançador de conjurs de nivell 12. la seva habilitat de llançament de conjur és Intel·ligència (spell save {@dc 17}; {@hit 11} a impactar amb atacs màgics). Té els següents conjurs de mag preparats:

trait.name: Olfacte Agut
entries: Zephyros has advantage a tirades d'habilitat de Saviesa ({@skill Percepció}) que involucrin l'olfacte.

action.name: Estimbar
entries: Zephyros tries to throw a Small or Medium creature within 10 feet of it. The target ha de salvar per Destresa amb {@dc 20} or be hurled up to 60 feet horizontally in a direction of Zephyros's choice and land {@condition prone}, taking {@dice 1d8} de dany contundent for every 10 feet it was thrown.

action.name: Wind Aura
entries: A magical aura of wind surrounds Zephyros. The aura is a 10-foot-radius sphere that lasts as long as he maintains concentration on it (as if concentrating on a spell). While the aura is in effect, Zephyros gains a +2 bonus to his AC against atacs armats a distància, and all open flames within the aura are extinguished unless they are magical.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Zephyros makes two staff attacks.

action.name: Staff of the Magi
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d6 + 10}) de dany contundent, o 23 ({@damage 3d8 + 10}) de dany contundent si s'usa amb dues mans. This damage is considered magical.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} a impactar, 60/240 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}30 ({@damage 4d10 + 8}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Unarmored Defense
entries: While Zi is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, her AC includes her Saviesa modifier.

trait.name: Roleplaying Information
entries: Zi Liang is a devout worshiper of Chauntea, the Earth Mother. She has considerably less faith in Goldenfields' defenders, so she patrols the temple-farm during her off-duty hours.
Ideal: "If we faithfully tend to our gardens and our fields, Chauntea will smile upon us."
Bond: "Goldenfields is the breadbasket of the North. People depend on its safety and prosperity, and I'll do what must be done to protect it."
Flaw: "I don't trust authority. I do what my heart says is right."

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Zi fa dos atacs armats melé.

action.name: Bastó
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) de dany contundent, o 5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) de dany contundent if used with both hands.

action.name: Fona
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 30/120 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) de dany contundent. Zi carries twenty sling stones.
